mapper.select: SELECT a.strf_id , a.user_id , b.title AS strfTitle , c.pic_name AS strfPic , b.category , g.detail_title AS locationName , d.price , COUNT(e.review_id) AS reviewCnt , AVG(e.rating) AS ratingAvg , COUNT(DISTINCT f.user_id) AS wishCnt , IF(EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM wishlist WHERE strf_id = a.strf_id AND (#{userId} IS NULL OR user_id = #{userId}) ), 1, 0) AS wishIn FROM recent a LEFT JOIN stay_tour_restaur_fest b ON a.strf_id = b.strf_id LEFT JOIN strf_pic c ON a.strf_id = c.strf_id LEFT JOIN menu d ON a.strf_id = d.strf_id LEFT JOIN review e ON a.strf_id = e.strf_id LEFT JOIN wishlist f ON a.strf_id = f.strf_id LEFT JOIN location_detail g ON b.location_detail_id = g.location_detail_id WHERE a.user_id = #{userId} AND a.undo_recent = 0 GROUP BY strf_id,b.title ORDER BY a.inquired_at DESC LIMIT 10
